title: Foundational Experiments
description: Formative period of creative exploration across film, gaming, music, and design industries, building broad skillset through hands-on experience and establishing understanding of what creates great work versus mediocre results.
keyMilestones: Worked as PA and stunt performer on Netflix-distributed feature film
Built Pro Dota 2 streaming presence with 2,000 followers on Justin.TV
Produced first album with local promotion and positive reception
Gained production management experience on Danny Trejo film projects
Developed foundational understanding of creative industry dynamics
